price: Hawatausikia mvumo wake, na wao watadumu katika yale zinayo yatamani nafsi zao.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Hawatasikia sauti ya Moto wake unavyo vuma. Nao huko watapata kila ambacho nafsi inatamani, daima milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna ḥasīsahā wahum fī mā ish'tahat anfusuhum khālidūna
